projects.title: Employees Trip Management Mobile App
projects.description: Mobile application for a prominent oil and gas company to optimize employee routes and commutes between work camps. Improved operational efficiency by 40%.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive mobile solution that revolutionized employee transportation management for a major oil and gas company. The app enables employees to book trips and parking spaces for their daily commute, featuring real-time data updates on trip availability and parking options. This solution significantly improved operational efficiency by 40% and enhanced employee satisfaction through streamlined booking processes.
achievements: Delivered app on time, exceeding client expectations
Improved operational efficiency by 40% through route optimization
Reduced booking time from 15 minutes to under 2 minutes
Contributed to scalable and modular architecture

projects.title: Health, Safety and Environment System
projects.description: Enterprise-grade backend system for HSE mobile app serving thousands of daily users with 99.9% uptime.
projects.longDescription: Led backend development for a critical HSE (Health, Safety, and Environment) system serving a major industrial client. Built robust RESTful APIs using Java Jersey framework, implementing complex business logic for incident reporting, safety inspections, and compliance management. The system handles thousands of daily transactions while maintaining 99.9% uptime and enterprise-grade security standards.
achievements: Successfully developed a robust backend system serving 5000+ daily active users
Maintained 99.9% uptime through proactive monitoring and optimization
Reduced incident reporting time by 60% through streamlined API design

projects.title: Hotel Management System
projects.description: Full-featured hotel management system with booking functionality, room management, and customer relationship management.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive hotel management system that streamlines hotel operations from booking to checkout. The system features a modern interface for both customers and employees, with dedicated portals for different user roles. Implemented advanced features including dynamic pricing, room availability tracking, waitlist management, and integrated payment processing.
achievements: Built complete hotel management solution from scratch
Implemented role-based access control for employees and customers
Created intuitive booking system with calendar integration
Designed efficient database schema for room management

projects.title: Bring a Flatbed

projects.longDescription: Leading development of a real-time auction application that connects flatbed truck owners with businesses needing transportation services. This senior design project showcases modern mobile development practices and real-time bidding functionality.

projects.title: Critical Security Fix - TLS 1.2 Implementation
projects.description: Saved millions by implementing a single-line TLS 1.2 security fix, preventing complete system rewrite at Muscat Clearing and Depository.
projects.longDescription: Identified and implemented a critical security fix that saved the organization from a multi-million dollar system rewrite. By implementing TLS 1.2 support with a single line of code, I prevented the need to rebuild the entire legacy system while ensuring compliance with modern security standards. This solution maintained zero downtime and allowed the company to continue operations without disruption.
achievements: Saved organization millions in potential rewrite costs
Ensured compliance with modern security standards
Completed critical fix in under 48 hours
